Class AnimationTile

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.map.Tile
      • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.map.AnimationTile
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionGeometryOwner, CollisionListener

    public abstract class AnimationTile
extends Tile
    An AnimationTile. Can be used as base class for tiles with an simple animation
